dict.string: Use this section to configure restrictions on a device.
You can specify additional restrictions, including maximum allowed content ratings, by creating a profile using Apple Configurator 2 or Profile Manager.
A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited. Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier.
The type of the payload, a reverse dns string.
The version of the whole configuration profile.
This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user
If Allow use of Camera is set to 'false', this will override this preference if set to 'true'.
Allow Apple Watch to auto unlock device
Allow Touch ID / Face ID to unlock device
Allow synchronization of Keychain with iCloud
Allow websites that use TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 to be accessed using Safari.
Allow accessing websites using TLS 1.0 and 1.1
Allow discovery of AirPrint printers using iBeacons
Disallow AirPrint to destinations with untrusted certificates
If 'Allow Screenshots and Screen Recording' is set to 'false', it also overrides this preference and prevents the Classroom app from observing remote screens.
Allow AirPlay and View Screen by Classroom app

If Allow screenshots and screen recording is set to 'false' or Allow AirPlay and View Screen by Classroom app, they also override this preference and prevents the Classroom app from unprompted remote AirPlay and view screens.
Additionally, if set to true and ScreenObservationPermissionModificationAllowed is also true in the Education payload, a student enrolled in a managed course via the Classroom app will automatically give permission to that course's teacher's requests to observe the student's screen without prompting the student.
Allow Classroom app to perform AirPlay and View Screen without prompting
Deprecated in iOS 11. Use forceClassroomUnpromptedScreenObservation instead.
Allow voice dialing while the device is locked
If Allow Siri is set to 'false', it also overrides this preference. This preference is ignored if the device does not have a passcode set.
Allow Siri when device is locked
When true, forces the use of the profanity filter assistant.
If Allow Siri is set to 'false', it also overrides this preference. This preference is ignored if the device does not have a passcode set.
Allow server-side logging of Siri commands
Allow server-side logging of Siri commands
If Allow installing apps is set to 'false', this will override this preference.
Allow installing apps using App Store
If Allow installing apps is set to 'false', this will override this preference.
Require iTunes Store password for all purchases
Allow managed apps to store data in iCloud
Allow notes and highlights sync for enterprise books
If set to false, prevents the use of iCloud Private Relay.
Allow Erase All Content and Settings
Allow users to accept untrusted TLS certificates
Allow trusting new enterprise app authors
Allows public-key-infrastructure updates to be carried out over the air. Does not disable OCL and OSCP checks
Allow user installation of configuration profiles
Allow Classroom to lock apps or the device without prompting
Automatically join Classroom classes without prompting
Require teacher permission to leave Classroom app unmanaged classes
Allow modifying celluar data app settings
Allow modifying Find My Friends settings
If set to false, disables Near-field Communication functionality.
If Allow modifying passcode is set to 'false', this will override this preference if set to 'true'.
Allow modifying Touch ID / Face ID
If set to 'false', disables the "Enable ScreenTime" option in the ScreenTime UI in Settings and disables ScreenTime if already enabled.
Set to false to allow new USB accessories to connect to a Mac without authorization
Allow booting into recovery by unpaired devices
Allow documents from managed sources in unmanaged destinations
Allow documents from unmanaged sources in managed destinations
Allow unmanaged apps to read contacts from managed contacts accounts
Allow unmanaged apps to read contacts from managed contacts accounts
Allow managed apps to write contacts to unmanaged contacts accounts
Allow managed apps to write contacts to unmanaged contacts accounts
When set to true, pasteboard functionality between managed and unmanaged apps mirrors that set for opening documents.
Allow submitting diagnostic and usage data to Apple
If Allow diagnostic and usage data to Apple is set to 'false', this will override this preference if set to 'true'.
Require Touch ID / Face ID authentication before Autofill
Prevents turning Wi-Fi off in Settings, Control Center, or by entering Airplane Mode.
Join only Wi-Fi networks installed by a Wi-Fi payload
Join only Wi-Fi networks installed by a Wi-Fi payload
Allow setting up new nearby iOS devices
Enable temporary sessions for iPads that have been enabled as Shared iPad.
Allow Apple Wallet notifications on Lock screen
Show Notification Center on Lock screen
Require passcode on first outgoing AirPlay pairing
If Allow AirPrint is set to 'false', it also overrides this preference.
Allow storage of AirPrint credentials in Keychain
If Allow use of Game Center is set to 'false', this will override this preference.
If Allow use of Safari is set to 'false', this will override this preference.
If Allow use of Safari is set to 'false', this will override this preference.
If Allow use of Safari is set to 'false', this will override this preference.
If Allow use of Safari is set to 'false', this will override this preference.
If Allow use of Safari is set to 'false', this will override this preference.
If set to false, prevents device name from being changed.
Prevents launching or even showing listed apps. Use bundle ID com.apple.webapp to disallow all webclips. Disabled when using the Allowed Apps preference
Prevents launching or even showing listed apps. Use bundle ID com.apple.webapp to disallow all webclips. Disabled when using the Allowed Apps preference
Prevents launching or even showing apps other than the listed ones. Use bundle ID com.apple.webapp to allow webclips. Disabled when using the Blocked Apps preference
Prevents launching or even showing apps other than the listed ones. Use bundle ID com.apple.webapp to allow webclips. Disabled when using the Blocked Apps preference
This 2-letter key is used by profile tools to display the proper ratings for given region. It is not recognized or reported by the client.
The maximum level of app content allowed on the device
The maximum level of movie content allowed on the device
The maximum level of TV content allowed on the device

When false, explicit music or video content purchased from the iTunes Store is hidden. Explicit content is marked as such by content providers, such as record labels, when sold through the iTunes Store. This key is deprecated on unsupervised devices.
Allow playback of explicit music, podcasts, and iTunes U
Allow connecting to and browsing any USB storage device in the Files App
If set to false, the user will not be able to download media from Apple Books that has been tagged as erotica.
Allow explicit sexual content in iBooks Store
If set to false, a user's device will not request passwords from nearby devices.
Allow proximity based password sharing requests
If set to true, delays user visibility of Software Updates.
Number of days the software updates will be hidden from the user.
Set to false to prevent the installation of rapid security responses
Set to false to prevent the removal of rapid security responses
Allows disabling Find My Device in the Find My app
Allows disabling Find My Friends in the Find My app
Allows preventing connection to network drives in the Files app
Period of time in seconds after which the device will require entry of password or passcode to unlock.
When false this disallows content caching. Defaults to true. Introduced in macOS 10.13 but moved to the content caching domain in 10.13.4.
Set to false to prevent sharing mouse and keyboard between a Mac and an iPad
Allow iCloud Back to My Mac
Number of days minor software updates will be hidden from the user.
If true, delays user visibility of non-OS Software Updates. Requires a supervised device.
Number of days non-OS software updates will be hidden from the user.
Number of days major software updates will be hidden from the user.
It is recommended to use the AirPlay Security Payload.
Require passcode on first incoming AirPlay pairing
If set to false, the Apple TV cannot be paired for use with the Remote app or Control Center widget.
